scripts.dev:mainnet: yarn ts-node scripts/update-block-number.ts && yarn hardhat node --max-memory 8192 --fork $(grep MAINNET_URL ../../.env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.dev:optimism: yarn ts-node scripts/update-block-number.ts && yarn hardhat node --max-memory 8192 --fork $(grep OPTIMISM_URL ../../.env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn compile && yarn hardhat deploy --network local
scripts.deploy:morphoblue:integration: yarn clean && yarn compile && yarn hardhat run scripts/morphoblue/deploy-morphoblue-integration.ts
scripts.format: prettier --write contracts/**/*.sol tasks/**/*.ts test/**/*.ts scripts/**/*.ts && yarn lint:fix
scripts.test: yarn test:unit && yarn test:integration:nocompile && yarn test:e2e:nocompile
scripts.test:nocompile: yarn test:unit:nocompile && yarn test:integration:nocompile && yarn test:e2e:nocompile
scripts.test:e2e: yarn clean && yarn compile && npx hardhat test --grep E2E
scripts.test:unit: yarn clean && yarn compile && npx hardhat test --grep Unit
scripts.test:integration: yarn clean && yarn compile && npx hardhat test --grep '\| Integration'
